# User Login Journey

This journey verifies the standard user login flow for the application.

## Acceptance Criteria

### AC-1: Navigate to Login Page
- User navigates to /login
- Login page is displayed
- Should see 'Sign In' heading

### AC-2: Enter Valid Credentials
- User enters '{{email}}' in 'Email' field
- User enters '{{password}}' in 'Password' field
- Click the 'Sign In' button

### AC-3: Verify Successful Login
- Should see the dashboard
- URL contains /dashboard
- Success toast with 'Welcome back' appears

## Procedural Steps

1. Navigate to /login (AC-1)
2. Verify login form is visible (AC-1)
3. Enter email from actor data (AC-2)
4. Enter password from actor data (AC-2)
5. Click Sign In button (AC-2)
6. Wait for navigation to dashboard (AC-3)
7. Verify welcome toast appears (AC-3)

## Data Notes

- Uses standard-user actor credentials
- No data cleanup needed (read-only operation)
- Login state persists via storage state
